name: Adult Wasteland Dragon
movement: burrow 30 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 70 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: The Adult Wasteland Dragon is a massive dragon with a chaotic and intimidating presence, characterized by its formidable size and natural armor. It exhibits a powerful physique capable of inflicting devastating damage and is known for its warping breath attack.
memorable: Its ability to create fear through its Frightful Presence and its powerful Warped Energy Breath makes it a memorable and terrifying antagonist.
goals: To dominate its territory and instill fear in any who dare approach.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other dragons or as a ruler of lesser creatures in the wasteland.
environment: Typically found in desolate wastelands or ruined landscapes.
strengths: High hit points, substantial melee damage output, and resistance to certain damage types make it a challenging foe.
weaknesses: Relatively low Dexterity limits its agility in combat.
attacks: Employs powerful melee attacks with its bite and claws, alongside a devastating tail swipe.
most_powerful_ability: Warped Energy Breath delivers a line attack that can decimate groups of adventurers.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect unseen foes.
skills: Specialized in Perception and Stealth, enabling it to detect hidden enemies and move silently.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on saving throws it would otherwise fail.
Creates a fear-inducing atmosphere with its Frightful Presence ability.
Can use legendary actions to adapt its attacks and reposition during combat.
test_queries: chaotic evil dragon with breath weapon
huge dragon capable of instilling fear
